50 minutesCountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish

The Road to Love is a surviving 1916 American drama silent film directed by Scott Sidney and written by Blanche Dougan Cole and Gardner Hunting. The film stars Lenore Ulric, Colin Chase, Lucille Ward, Estelle Allen, Gayne Whitman and Herschel Mayall. The film was released on December 7, 1916, by Paramount Pictures.[1][2]

Joe Massey as The Old Sheik

Alfred Hollingsworth as Abdallah

Preservation status

[edit]

A copy is preserved in the Library of Congress collection.[3][4]
